title: Sampler, 1688
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton and linen embroidery on linen foundation 
Technique: embroidered in satin, eyelet, stem, back and cross stitches on plain weave with withdrawn element work
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Letters and detached geometric motifs. Withdrawn element work with needle-made fillings using linen.
